subject: Tennis
Rogers Cup (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat Andy Murray, 7-6 (2), 6-3, to reach the final of the Rogers Cup in Toronto and put himself in line for his seventh title of the year. Nadal will face Nicolas Kiefer, who advanced to the championship with a 6-7 (4), 6-3, 7-6 (5) win over Gilles Simon.
